title: ЛАПТОП ASUS ROG STRIX G16 G614JU-N3092 16" I5-13450HX/16GB DDR5/512GB/RTX 4050 6GB
description:
Лаптоп
Дисплеј:16.0" (40.6cm)
Резолуција:(1920 x 1200) FHD+, IPS, 160Hz, G-Sync
Процесор:13th Gen Intel Core i5-13450HX Processor 2.4 GHz (20M Cache, up to 4.6 GHz, 10 cores: 6 P-cores)
Графика:NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4050 6GB GDDR6
RAM Меморија:16GB DDR5-4800
Диск (Storage):512GB PCIe 4.0 NVMe M.2 SSD
Без оперативен систем
LAN 10/100/1000 Mbps
Wi-Fi 6E(802.11ax) (Triple band) 2*2 + Bluetooth 5.3
Порти:
1x RJ45 LAN port
1x Thunderbolt 4 support DisplayPort
1x USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C support DisplayPort / power delivery / G-SYNC
2x USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-A
1x HDMI 2.1 FRL
1x 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack
720P HD camera
Вгаден микрофон
Осветлена тастатура: Backlit Chiclet Keyboard 4-Zone RGB
2x звучници со Smart Amplifier технологија
Аудио:Tech AI noise-canceling - Dolby Atmos
Security BIOS Administrator Password and User Password Protection
Батерија:90WHrs, 4S1P, 4-cell Li-ion
280W AC Adapter

features.security_feature_1: BIOS Administrator Password and User Password Protection
